item.description: 一、安装 Oh My Posh for PowerShell winget install JanDeDobbeleer.OhMyPosh -s winget二、选择主题 主题列表：https://ohmyposh.dev/docs/themes 选择主题，并使用

item.title: 安装 Jenkins 遇到的问题
item.author: Ryan
item.description: 安装 Jenkins 遇到的问题 问题一 root@server:/apps# systemctl restart jenkins.service Job for jenkins.service failed because the control process exited with error code. See "systemctl status jenkins.service" and "journalctl -xe" for details. root@server:/apps# root@server:/apps# systemctl status jenkins.service ● jenkins.service - Jenkins Continuous Integration Server Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/jenkins.service; enabled; vendor preset: enabled) Active: failed (Result: exit-code) since Tue 2023-05-16 16:36:43 CST; 5s ago Process: 168567 ExecStart=/usr/bin/jenkins (code=exited,

item.title: 美化终端命令行显示
item.author: Ryan
item.description: Linux命令行提示符默认是白色，很多时候不太方便查看命令和记录，而且默认是显示的完整路径，如果路径过 长，开发和看起来都不方便，所以改变一下
